comment_text: This is one of the videos on this channel with the least views as of may 21st 2021 with 4,485 views
so this is your least viewed video

This is so sweet! I´m a peruvian girl living in Peru and I know how much this things means to kids who don´t have a lot in a material sense, but have so much in their little hearts. Thanks for this vid.
Initially they all just looked bored, like "when can we get back to our playstations?"
"No puppets peed in the vicinity of the falls in the making of this video."
